inclusion.criterion: Male, 45 years of age or older.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical stage T1a, T1b, T1c, T2a, T2b orT2c.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: One, two, or three tumor suspicious regions identified on multiparametric MRI.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Negative radiographic indication of extra-capsular extent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status of at least 70.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Estimated survival of 5 years or greater, as determined by treating physician.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of any condition (e.g., metal implant, shrapnel) not compatible with MRI.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe lower urinary tract symptoms as measured by an International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) of 20 or greater.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of other Primary non-skin malignancy within previous three years.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with a history of acute urinary retention and a large prostate. He has a PSA level of 3.5 ng/mL and a normal recent blood chemistry.
